articles.description: When asked about the Gyanvapi issue, BJP chief JP Nadda said: "We have always talked about the cultural development of the country. But these issues will be decided by courts and the Constitution...and the BJP will implement it in letter and spirit".

articles.title: India reports 2,338 new cases, 19 deaths in last 24 hours
articles.description: India's active cases reached 17,883, seeing an increase of 185 cases from Monday. The active cases comprise 0.04 per cent of the total infections, while the national Covid-19 recovery rate was 98.74 per cent, the ministry said.
